''{{unicode|Bhārat Gaṇarājya}}'' |conventional_long_name = Republic of India |common_name = India |image_flag = Flag of India.svg |image_coat = Emblem of India.svg |symbol_type = Emblem |national_motto = ''[[Satyameva Jayate]]'' {{nbsp|2}}([[Sanskrit language|Sanskrit]])
सत्यमेव जयते  ([[Devanāgarī]])
"Truth Alone Triumphs" |image_map = IndiaLocation.png Although 80.5% of Indians report themselves as [[Hinduism|Hindus]], India's [[Muslim]] population is the world's second largest; they constitute 13.4% of the population. Other religious groups include [[Christianity|Christians]] (2.3%), [[Sikhism|Sikhs]] (1.9%), [[Buddhism|Buddhists]] (0.8%), [[Jainism|Jains]] (0.4%), [[Jew]]s, [[Ayyavazhi|Ayyavazhi's]], [[Zoroastrians]] and [[Bahá'í Faith|Bahá'í]]s. ==See also== {{Indian topics}} ==References== {{reflist|2}} ==External links== {{Spoken Wikipedia|India.ogg|2006-03-07}} {{sisterlinks|India}}
